SELECT 'HeadHuntPost' AS POST_category, HEADHUNTPOST.HEADHUNTPOST_id, MEMBER.MEMBER_nickname, HEADHUNTPOST.HEADHUNTPOST_title, HEADHUNTPOST.HEADHUNTPOST_content, HEADHUNTPOST.HEADHUNTPOST_date, HEADHUNTPOST.HEADHUNTPOST_viewcnt, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RECOMMEND WHERE RECOMMEND.POST_id = HEADHUNTPOST.HEADHUNTPOST_id ) AS RECOMMEND_cnt, ( SELECT POSTIMG.POSTIMG_name FROM POSTIMG WHERE POSTIMG.POST_id = HEADHUNTPOST.HEADHUNTPOST_id ORDER BY POSTIMG.POSTIMG_id ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS POSTIMG_name FROM HEADHUNTPOST INNER JOIN MEMBER ON HEADHUNTPOST.MEMBER_id = MEMBER.MEMBER_id LEFT JOIN RECOMMEND ON HEADHUNTPOST.HEADHUNTPOST_id = RECOMMEND.POST_id WHERE 1=1
AND HEADHUNTPOST_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{headHuntPostTitle},'%')
AND HEADHUNTPOST_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{headHuntPostContent},'%')
AND member_nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{memeberNickname},'%')
AND HEADHUNTPOST_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{titleAndContents},'%')
AND HEADHUNTPOST_role LIKE CONCAT('%',#{role},'%')
AND HEADHUNTPOST_region LIKE CONCAT('%',#{region},'%')
AND HEADHUNTPOST_concept LIKE CONCAT('%',#{headHuntPostConcept},'%')
AND HEADHUNTPOST_pay BETWEEN #{minPay} AND #{maxPay}
ORDER BY HEADHUNTPOST.HEADHUNTPOST_date DESC
